name: GuideMe
signal_source: Senior app research shows older users prefer 'video tutorials' over written instructions with need for 'simple, familiar, and unambiguous language'
description: Step-by-step video guidance app for older adults learning to use smartphones and basic digital services
target_user: Older adults who feel anxious about technology and need patient, clear guidance for basic smartphone functions
pain_point_evidence: Seniors struggle with 'complicated jargon' and need 'short instructions to avoid overwhelming cognitive effort'
differentiation: Video-first learning vs. text-based help, designed specifically for senior learning patterns
subscription_fit: Premium includes personalized learning paths, family sharing, and priority support

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic videos, premium for personalized paths and family features
